aircraft.value: Warhawk Combat - AC-8105-633 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 20/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 21/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 25/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 23/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/09/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
